name: 1SlimePlz
description:
Merge all slimes into 1 slime to win each level. Different kind of slimes use special ways to merge them together.

How to play

  • Click on the empty tile between slimes to merge them
  • The goal is to have only one slime on the table
  • Collect the star by landing the last slime on top

There are 2 game modes.

  • Level mode initially has 40 levels.
  • Time trail mode lets you solve auto generated levels within time limit.
